title: Column 'Domain' does not belong to table .
author: SanderGit
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Updated from 1.77.1 to 1.77.2 nightly. This loses the settings.

## Current Behavior
Connect to the 1.77.1 SQL database (MSSQL)

Error: An unhandled exception has occurred
Exception Message: Column 'Domain' does not belong to table .


## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Update mRemoteNG to 1.77.2 nightly
2. Open it
3. Configure MSSQL connection

## Context
Try to get my connections back

## Your Environment
Windows Server 2012R2, SQL Server 2014
OS: Mi...

comments.author: theoneandonly-vector
comments.snippet: @SanderGit what did you do to fix the "Column 'VmId' does not belong to table"?

comments.author: theoneandonly-vector
comments.snippet: ok.. I just exported all my setting shten recreated th etable with the latest script and imported.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage (P3 stale status): this issue is labeled as actively worked, but activity appears stale. Please confirm whether work is still in progress. If not, please relabel to Need 2 check (or close) to keep status labels accurate.

comments.snippet:
